title: Drawing, "Design for Street Scene, for Othello", 1932
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A theater set design on black paper. Upper drawing: a sketch of a scene with white arched building on the right; at center, a short staircase leading to a bridge; left, a small arched building. Lower drawing: a crenellated tower in white outline, stairs and partial crenellated wall. Two hole punches on left edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Street Scene, for Othello", 1932.
1932. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-182.
